chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: The Spring.NET Social Dropbox project is an extension to Spring.NET Social that enables integration with Dropbox. The Spring.NET REST Client Framework is used to consume Dropbox REST API.
Dropbox is a free service that lets you bring your photos, docs, and videos anywhere and share them easily.

Spring.NET Social Dropbox supports the following .NET Frameworks :
.NET 2.0
.NET Client Profile 3.5 and 4.0
Windows Phone 7.0 and 7.1

As an extension, Spring.NET Social Dropbox depends on Spring.NET Social.
Note that Spring.NET Social Dropbox may release on a different schedule than Spring.NET Social. Consequently, Spring.NET Social's version may differ from that of Spring.NET Social Dropbox.
